modules.name: TuringMaschineRythm
modules.description: Controlled chaos CV sequencer. Semi-random loops that evolve organically—dial in the perfect balance between order and entropy.

modules.name: TuringGates
modules.description: Rhythmic gate patterns extracted from chaos. Transform your Turing sequences into polyrhythmic triggers.

modules.name: TuringFlow
modules.description: Deep-dive CV extraction from the bit stream. Unlock hidden modulation dimensions lurking inside your sequences.

modules.name: Tape Machine
modules.description: Authentic tape degradation engine. Saturate, wobble, and age your sound with mechanical imperfection.

modules.name: Kabaddon
modules.description: Brutal percussive synth. Spectral waveshaping meets kick drum physics for earth-shaking low end.

modules.name: Andras
modules.description: Hybrid beast oscillator. Fuse clean waveforms with chaotic bit textures and voltage-controlled combs for massive, evolving tones.

modules.name: Ahriman
modules.description: Haunted stereo reverb. Dense, modulated spaces that range from ethereal shimmer to corrupted digital decay.

modules.name: Leviathan
modules.description: Techno destruction unit. Fold, crush, and octavize with DOOM subs and the legendary Smoosh algorithm.

modules.name: Sitri
modules.description: Algorithmic brain sequencer. Multiple generative engines with swing, quantization, and velocity shaping—expandable via Lilith modules.

modules.name: Lilith
modules.description: 8-step companion to Sitri's brain. Per-step CV sculpting and gate logic, standalone or chained.

modules.name: Lilith Advance
modules.description: 16-step evolution of Lilith. Extended per-step control for deeper sequence manipulation.

modules.name: Buer
modules.description: Per-step modulation control center. Attenuvert and remotely tweak every parameter of your Lilith sequences.

modules.name: Nergal Amp
modules.description: Neural amp modeling unleashed. Load NAM profiles, shape tone, and voltage-control every parameter for dynamic amp responses.

modules.name: Sabnock OTT
modules.description: Surgical multiband domination. OTT-style compression with per-band upward/downward control and deep CV integration.

modules.name: Xezbeth:4X
modules.description: Boutique summing mixer. Choose pristine clarity or Neve-style harmonics with flexible pan laws and pro metering.
